column5: ARROW-14664: [C++] Fix accepted types for Parquet encoding DELTA_BYTE_ARRAY
column6: commit f1fcc4f2bfe5b115bda96fa547da4c0b4328685cAuthor: Antoine Pitrou <antoine@python.org>Date:   Tue Nov 16 11:57:09 2021 +0100    ARROW-14664: [C++] Fix accepted types for Parquet encoding DELTA_BYTE_ARRAY        DELTA_BYTE_ARRAY is only applicable to BYTE_ARRAY but we would also accept FIXED_LEN_BYTE_ARRAY.    Casting the decoder to the expected subtype would then produce a null pointer.        Found by OSS-Fuzz.  Should fix the following issue:    - https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=40865        Closes #11664 from pitrou/ARROW-14664-parquet-encoding        Authored-by: Antoine Pitrou <antoine@python.org>    Signed-off-by: Antoine Pitrou <antoine@python.org>
